document_data.name: Shanties for the Bitch Queen
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shanties for the Bitch Queen''''' was a collection of sea shanties dedicated to [[Umberlee]].
document_data.Description: This worn blue book was compiled to honor the goddess of the sea, Umberlee. It contained three main shanties, one starting with "''And we all row!''", another with "''Wavemother, wavemother''", and the third with "''Souls aweigh and anchors still!''".
document_data.History: After fishers of the [[Western Heartlands]] were attacked in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]], this collection of verses lay on a wooden dock near the shore.
